resources.string:
• Reception desk open 24 hours a day\n
• The hotel has a no smoking policy\n
• Free PC + internet in the lobby\n
• Free Wi-Fi\n
• Coeliac catering (necessary to order in advance)\n
• Library\n
• Fire alarm\n
• Wheelchair access\n
• Ironing board and iron available\n
• Telephone alarm\n
• Pets are not allowed\n
• Baby cot free of charge\n
• Board games

• Training congress centre\n
• Catering services\n
• Babysitting\n
• Lobby bar\n
• Transfers arranged\n
• Laundry service\n
• Additional beds can be placed in the apartments\n
• Fruit basket (necessary to order in advance)\n
• Bottle of sparkling wine and Leonidas chocolate pralines\n
• Flowers in the room (necessary to order in advance)\n
• Upgrade to a higher room standard
